name: Wasteland (Future)
description:
"Future Saga" Category Super Class 
enemies' and allies' ATK & DEF +10%

name: Infinite Zamasu
description:
Increases damage received by 
Super Class enemies and allies by 30%

name: City (Future) (Rainy)
description:
Increases damage received by 
Extreme Class enemies and allies by 30%

name: City (Future) (Rift in Time)
description:
"Super Bosses" Category enemies' and allies' 
ATK & DEF +10%, plus an additional ATK & DEF +10% 
for characters who are also Extreme Class

name: Extradimensional Space
description:
Extreme Class enemies' and allies' ATK & DEF +10%, 
plus an additional ATK & DEF +10% for characters 
who also belong to the "Exploding Rage" or 
"Movie Bosses" Category; increases damage 
received by Super Class enemies and allies by 10%
